code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSocket}from'../context/SocketContext';import{getRandomColor}from'../utils/colors';import'../styles/Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const{connectToServer}=useSocket();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(username.trim()){const color=getRandomColor();connectToServer(username,color);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Collaborative Editor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Join the collaborative editing session"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Enter your name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Your name",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"Join Session"})]})]})});};export default Login;
